item.tfmg.quad_potato_cannon.tooltip.sum: Launches 4 of your home-grown vegetables at Enemies. Can be powered with _Air_ _Pressure_ from a _Backtank_
item.tfmg.quad_potato_cannon.tooltip.beh: _No_ _Durability_ will be used. Instead, _Air_ _pressure_ is drained from the Tank
item.tfmg.advanced_potato_cannon.tooltip: Launches _Napalm Potatoes_ at Enemies. Can be powered with _Air_ _Pressure_ from a _Backtank_
_No_ _Durability_ will be used. Instead, _Air_ _pressure_ is drained from the Tank
item.tfmg.flamethrower.tooltip.summary: Burns  burnable _Gases_ and _Fluids_ to shoot out a burst of flame to burn your Enemies
item.tfmg.flamethrower.tooltip.condition: When R-Clicking a Fluid Tank with a Burnable Fluid/Gas inside
item.tfmg.flamethrower.tooltip.behaviour: The _Fuel_ will be consumed from the tank. _Range_ and _Spread_ change according to your _Fuel_ of choice
item.tfmg.lithium_blade.tooltip.summary: Using _Steel Ingot_Lithium Charges_, this Blade is set aflame burning enemies and shooting out Bolts of _Hellfire_
item.tfmg.lithium_blade.tooltip.behaviou: Is set on hellfire, consuming a _Lithium Charge_. Its flame sets enemies on fire for a set amount of time, this fire is renewed even after Enemy extinguishes themself in water
Shoots out several bolts of _Hellfire_ consuming the blades charge
item.tfmg.screwdriver.tooltip.behaviour1: Locks _Pipe_ in its current rotation allowing for _Pipes_ to be placed next to eachother _Without Connecting_
block.tfmg.formwork_block.tooltip.summar: Holds Liquid Concrete until it turns into concrete blocks
block.tfmg.formwork_block.tooltip.behavi: Fills out with _Liquid Concrete_, this Concrete eventually turns into solid blocks
Holds Liquid Concrete until it turns into rebar concrete blocks
Fills out with _Liquid Concrete_, this concrete eventually turns into solid rebar concrete blocks
block.tfmg.firebox.tooltip.summary: Uses burnables to function as a blaze burner
block.tfmg.firebox.tooltip.behaviour1: The _Firebox_ will act as a _Blaze Burner_ until it runs out of fuel, there is no way to superheat it
block.tfmg.polarizer.tooltip.summary: Makes Magnetic Ingots out of Steel
block.tfmg.polarizer.tooltip.behaviour1: Will turn a _Steel Ingot_ into a _Magnetic Ingot_ when right clicked with a _Steel Ingot_
block.tfmg.energy_meter.condition2: When looked on with Engineer's Goggles
block.tfmg.energy_meter.tooltip.behaviou: Shows detailed info on the sources energy
block.tfmg.voltmeter.tooltip.behaviour1: Measures the _Voltage_ of the _Power Source_ the max energy on the _Voltmeter_ is determined by its _Measuring Range_
block.tfmg.voltmeter.condition2: When looked on with Engineer's Goggles
block.tfmg.voltmeter.tooltip.behaviour2: Shows detailed info on the sources _Voltage_ as well as the Voltmeters _Measuring Range_
block.tfmg.converter.tooltip.summary: Makes other mods compatible with TFMG by adding voltage
block.tfmg.converter.behaviour1: The _Top_ outputs FE With _Voltage_ making it usable with _TFMG_
block.tfmg.light_bulb.behaviour1: The lightbulb will _Glow_ if _Voltage_ and _Energy_ are balanced, the higher the _Voltage_, the stronger the glow
block.tfmg.rgb_light_bulb.tooltip.summar: Glows in a certain color when Powered
block.tfmg.rgb_light_bulb.behaviour1: The lightbulb will _Glow_ if _Voltage_ and _Energy_ are balanced, the higher the _Voltage_, the stronger the glow
block.tfmg.creative_generator.tooltip.su: Outputs energy based on the value on its input panel
block.tfmg.cable connector.tooltip.summa: Right click 2 cable connectors with a _Copper Cable_ amking them transport _Energy_
block.tfmg.lithium_torch.tooltip.summary: Works underwater and can be placed upside down
Transports Energy like a Cable (But diagonally)
block.tfmg.capacitor.tooltip.summary: Holds a Small Amount of energy (inserted from bottom) that can be outputted Quickly from the Top
block.tfmg.accumulator.tooltip.summary: Holds a Large Amount of energy (inserted from bottom) that can be outputted Slowly from the Top
block.tfmg.electric_motor.tooltip.summar: Changes energy to rotation (rpm configurable on side)
block.tfmg.copper_coil.tooltip.behaviour: To increase voltage you have to have to towers of coils either next to or one block from eachother, one atleast 1 block larger than the other, both max 5 blocks in height and with their top blocks touching. R-Click the top block in the larger tower with a wrench  to make it the output. Energy is both inputted and outputted on the top of their respective towers
block.tfmg.flarestack.tooltip.condition1: When Pumped burnable Fluids/Gases into from the bottom
block.tfmg.resistor.tooltip.condition1: When Put Energy into from the back (where strip of lead is smaller on top of the texture)
block.tfmg.resistor.tooltip.behaviour1: Outputs energy with voltage based on its allowed voltage (configurable on top) on front
block.tfmg.galvanic_cell.tooltip.summary: Has a small amount of unchargable energy inside, ideal for starting your venture into electricity
block.tfmg.neon_tube.tooltip.summary: Glows in a certain color when Powered
block.tfmg.low_grade_fuel_engine.behavio: Will output a small amount of _RPM_ based on the strength of the _Redstone Signal_ inputted into it
block.tfmg.compact_engine.behaviour1: Will output _RPM_ based on the strength of the _Redstone Signal_ inputted into it
block.tfmg.fireclay.tooltip.summary: It is found in underground veins in the overworld
block.tfmg.copper_cable_hub.tooltip.summ: Can be turned off with redstone
block.tfmg.aluminium_cable_hub.tooltip.s: Can be turned off with redstone
block.tfmg.brass_cable_hub.tooltip.summa: Can be turned off with redstone
block.tfmg.steel_cable_hub.tooltip.summa: Can be turned off with redstone
block.tfmg.heavy_cable_hub.tooltip.summa: Can be turned off with redstone
block.tfmg.steel_casing_cable_hub.toolti: Can be turned off with redstone
block.tfmg.copycat_cable_block.tooltip.s: Can be turned off with redstone
